title: Vanquished Knight
description: A debauched dragon king subjugates a chaste knight who has volunteered to be his willing captive.King Caine and his councilor Randell are owed a debt by the mortal king ruling in the land above them. When Caine sees the knight Jonah he’s stricken by his beauty and innocence—and then senses something even more compelling about him. Jonah surprises everyone by accepting his fate as Caine’s sacrifice. He willingly descends to Darkhelm to be used as the king and his councilor see fit.An erotic BDSM medieval fantasy with a romantic twist!
author: Yamila Abraham
